version_description:
version 1.4.0
- Added a new Valentine Theme.
- Bug fixes.

Please send any suggestions you might have to support@kiragames.com.
Thank you for all your continued support and being a loyal fan of Unblock Me™.

This is a hot fix for those that experience errors or black screen in the previous update, this update should fix that problem. We are really sorry for the inconvenience this may have caused you. Please feel free to contact support@kiragames.com if you are still having experiencing difficulties with Unblock Me.

We are also aware that some of you do not like the new dialog that pops in between the puzzles in Relax mode. We are re-designing that and will also release another update to fix that as well. Thank you for all your support.

Here comes another exciting update for Unblock Me. We heard your suggestions and here the the results

- We've added 3 additional language to Unblock Me including French, Italian and Turkish
- We've added a quick Language button to the game so you don't have to go to the option menu to change the language
- The game is now 15 Meg smaller and loads much much faster
- We've also fixed many minor bugs that you've reported to us to make your Unblock Me is smoother than ever.

Here comes another massive exciting update for Unblock Me. We heard your suggestions and here the the results

+ A new colorful and fun Easter Theme : So you can enjoy playing Unblock Me during Easter :)

+ iCloud Save between devices : You can now save your Unblock Me progress between devices on iOS using iCloud. Simply by
On the Device you want to save your progress
1. In the Main Menu
2. Press Option
3. Press Transfer Data
4. Select “Save”, this will put your Unblock Me’s Progress in iCloud
On the Device you want to transfer your progress to
1. In the Main Menu
2. Press Option
3. Press Transfer Data
4. Select “Load”, this will sync this device progress with Unblock Me’s Progress in your iCloud.
Please make sure you have activated/verified your iCloud and have internet connectivity.

+ Add “Best Moves” or “Perfect Move” in the Challenge Mode play screen

Please feel free to contact support@kiragames.com for any problems or suggestions you might have with Unblock Me. Thank you for your support!

This is a quick fix for a very rare issue for users who are experiencing crashes after completing a puzzle and can not reopen the game. We are sorry for the the issue and thank you everyone who have reported this issue to us. Thank you for your support!

Here another awesome Unblock Me update! In this update, we've added a new Multiplayer mode where you can play against your friends or any Unblockers around the world.

Here are the new features packed in this update
- A new Multiplayer mode, play against your friends or any player around the world!
- You can now sync game progress automatically. If you are using the same Apple ID between devices, your game progress will automatically sync between device when you have the Sync Data option turn on in the Option Menu.
- In order for data sync and multiplayer to work you will need to enable iCloud on your devices.

Thank you for your support! Please let us know what you think at support@kiragames.com so we can hear your suggestions or issues and continue to make Unblock Me Better.
Enjoy!!

In this update, we've addressed a minor issue with In App Purchases on newer iOS that was preventing our in app products to be delivered. We are sorry for the inconvenient and please contact support@kiragames.com if you have had any issues with our in app products.

Thank you for your support! Please let us know what you think at support@kiragames.com so we can hear your suggestions or issues and continue to make Unblock Me Better.
Enjoy!!

In this update, we improved many issues in Unblock Me such as reducing the game size and making sure that Unblock Me is using as least resources as possible so users can play Unblock Me without feeling any lags or glitches. We would also love to hear more feedback about our Multiplayer mode so please feel free to let us know what you think about our new Multiplayer mode email @ support@kiragames.com. Do you have issues inviting your friends or what other features would you like to see ? Thank you!

Thank you for your support! Please let us know what you think at support@kiragames.com so we can hear your suggestions or issues and continue to make Unblock Me Better.
Enjoy!!

Please remember that you can sync your game data between devices in any case that you got a new phone and want to continue to play Unblock Me. Simply by going to the "Option Screen" and turn on "Sync data" for both your old and new device, make sure that you have login your iCloud account and you game progress will be sync to your new iOS device. In this new update we added new awesome features such as

- Added a new theme for the season, the "Spring theme"
- Added a new translation using the Union flag for the United Kingdom English
- Added more hint options in the Store menu
- Fixed a banner bug that would cause it to appear in the Game screen
- Fix many minor bugs

Thank you for your continue support.

Please let us know if you have any issues with Unblock Me or would like to suggest a new feature for all the Unblockers. Feel free to contact us at support@kiragames.com or our fanpage at www.fb.com/kiragames.

Please remember that you can sync your game data between devices in any case that you got a new phone and want to continue to play Unblock Me. Simply by going to the "Option Screen" and turn on "Sync data" for both your old and new device, make sure that you have login your iCloud account and you game progress will be sync to your new iOS device.

In this new update we fixed an issue that was caused on devices with iOS 9.0 up, we are truly sorry for any of our users that have been experiencing this bug. And please let us know if there are still any issues that might prevent you from enjoying Unblock Me.

Thank you for your continue support.

Please let us know if you have any issues with Unblock Me or would like to suggest a new feature for all the Unblockers. Feel free to contact us at support@kiragames.com or our fanpage at www.fb.com/kiragames.

Please remember that you can sync your game data between devices in any case that you got a new phone and want to continue to play Unblock Me. Simply by going to the "Option Screen" and turn on "Sync data" for both your old and new device, make sure that you have login your iCloud account and you game progress will be sync to your new iOS device.

Here comes another awesome update for you Unblockers! Some of the new features are
- We added 300 more new Beginner puzzles
- We added 200 more new Intermediate puzzle making Unblock Me having a total of 15000 puzzles
- Sounds from full screen ads will now be disabled if you have also disabled the game sound
- The Leaderboard button is now moved to the main menu for easier access
- We've also fixed many more bugs regarding the Multiplayer mode.

Please feel free to send feedback, feature request or pizza coupons to support@kiragames.com. And if you like our new update, please help spread the word, share it on facebook/twitter and give us a five star so other people will know that our game is cool :) Thank you!

Please remember that you can sync your game data between devices in any case that you got a new phone and want to continue to play Unblock Me. Simply by going to the "Option Screen" and turn on "Sync data" for both your old and new device, make sure that you have login your iCloud account and you game progress will be sync to your new iOS device.

Here comes another awesome update for you Unblockers! Some of the new features are
- We've added a new Autumn theme ! So nice and so relaxing, please don't forget to try out the new theme :)

Please feel free to send feedback, feature request or pizza coupons to support@kiragames.com. And if you like our new update, please help spread the word, share it on facebook/twitter and give us a five star so other people will know that our game is cool :) Thank you!

Please remember that you can sync your game data between devices in any case that you got a new phone and want to continue to play Unblock Me. Simply by going to the "Option Screen" and turn on "Sync data" for both your old and new device, make sure that you have login your iCloud account and you game progress will be sync to your new iOS device.

Here comes another awesome update for you Unblockers! Some of the new features are
- Added a new Winter Theme, please try it out! It's amazing
- Decrease game size after installation
- A confirmation box will be presented when using the reset puzzle feature

Please feel free to send feedback, feature request or pizza coupons to support@kiragames.com. And if you like our new update, please help spread the word, share it on facebook/twitter and give us a five star so other people will know that our game is cool :) Thank you!

Please remember that you can sync your game data between devices in any case that you got a new phone and want to continue to play Unblock Me. Simply by going to the "Option Screen" and turn on "Sync data" for both your old and new device, make sure that you have login your iCloud account and you game progress will be sync to your new iOS device.

- This update is a hot fix for some users experiencing issues with Unblock Me after completing a puzzle. We are terribly sorry for the issue.

Please feel free to send feedback, feature request or pizza coupons to support@kiragames.com. And if you like our new update, please help spread the word, share it on facebook/twitter and give us a five star so other people will know that our game is cool :) Thank you!

We heard what our fans wanted and our fans wanted Hints! So we are giving away hints to everyone as requested :)

With this new update, you can now open Unblock Me everyday and earn up to 2 hints with the new Daily Reward system! We are also excited to let everyone know that we have included a brand new set of Unblock Me puzzles that you have never played anywhere before called the "Daily Puzzles". These new puzzle will have new exits with new obstacle in each puzzles that will make Unblock Me even more entertaining and more challenging. These puzzles are unique and one of a kind puzzles that you have never played anywhere before!! Your daily puzzles will start with 100 initial puzzles and will increase 1 puzzle everyday you play Unblock Me.

In this update new features include
- You can always disable notification within the option menu and select "Notification Off"
- Add notifications to ease your anticipation when the Daily Puzzle and Daily Reward is available, you can always disable this notification within the option menu and select "Notification Off"
- Daily Puzzles : A new type of puzzles with new exits and puzzle obstacles, get 1 more new daily puzzle everyday by opening the game
- Daily Hint Reward : You can now earn more hints simply by playing the game everyday
- Add an option to disable the reset puzzle dialog
- Improve Memory footprint for Unblock Me themes, you should be able to notice improvements to loading time
- Fix many minor issues regarding memory management

Please send us your feedback and suggestions to support@kiragames.com. Thank you for your support!

It's time for more awesome features for our fans. In this update, we released a new "Summer theme"! Please try it out and let us know if you like it :)

In this update new features include
- A new colourful and bright "Summer Theme" that will make you enjoy Unblock Me even more!
- The Puzzle screen will now scroll down to “uncompleted” puzzles or to “non 3 star” puzzles so you don’t have to find them in your list. Requested by many of our users, enjoy!
- Fix many minor issues with our user experience flow.

What features do you want to see from Unblock Me in our next update ? Social features such as Facebook invites or Twitter share ? Please let us know !! :)
Send us your feedback and suggestions to support@kiragames.com. Thank you for your support!

It's time for another awesome update from Unblock Me. In this update we added some new cool features

- A new starter pack with 200 puzzles. This starter pack are design to be played by new comers who are not familiar with Unblock Me yet but our regular players who just want to relax will enjoy these puzzles too.
- By popular request, you were asking for ways to get more hints so we added more ways. You can now get more hints by watch our sponsors Ads.
- We also notice some of you were having issues with Ads that are causing the game to freeze. We completely remove that Ad network so everything should be more stable now.
- Update Facebook and Twitter sharing features
- Push notifications are now Opt-in only and is set to be disabled by default
- Added Canadian and Australian English
- Change the description for each game mode to be more clearer. Relax - doesn't count moves. Challenge - count moves and display best moves. Daily Puzzle - puzzles with obstacle and new exits.

What features do you want to see from Unblock Me in our next update ? Social features such as Facebook invites or Twitter share ? Please let us know !! :)
Send us your feedback and suggestions to support@kiragames.com. Thank you for your support!

It’s our 10th BIRTHDAY! Let’s Celebrate!
Today 16th MAY 2019, ‘Unblock Me’ marks its 10th anniversary year. We would like to thanking you all! It has been a puzzle adventure!

To celebrate with us, enjoy our in-game presents; FREE HINTS, DOUBLE DAILY REWARDS, 2 AMAZING NEW THEMES – WOODEN BEIGE & OCEAN BLUE!

We hope to keep you happily gaming with us for another decade or two!

Catch us at Facebook: Kiragames

Wish us a Happy 10th Birthday? Let us know at support@kiragames.com

Happy Chinese Year of the Pig 2019
‘May it be a great year of love, health, wealth and joy’
Enjoy a brand new theme ‘Chinese New Year’. (Special thanks: 黄丽)
Check out the Lucky Red Envelope!

Stay up to date on Facebook: Kiragames
Thanks for playing and keep ‘Unblock’ Me!

Any ideas on our new updates? Come up with suggestions? Share them with us at support@kiragames.com

Spring has sprung! A great time to ‘Unblock the Blocked’ outdoors!
Happy Spring! ‘May your days blossom with joy and free hints!’
Enjoy our seasonal ‘Spring’ theme & make the flowers bloom.

- Do not forget to look for the ‘Share icon’ on the Statistics Page! You can now share your ‘Unblock Me’ achievements.
- We have updated the in-game puzzle solving dialogue in Challenge mode.
- We have also updated the ‘Language icon’ & ‘Touch Feedback’ for a better gaming experience.

Catch us at Facebook: Kiragames

Thanks for playing ‘Unblock Me’!

Any ideas on our new updates? Share them with us at support@kiragames.com

This update includes a number of bug fixes and stability improvements.

- Fix the crash after data sync
- Fix the freezing block
- Fix the number of moves that changes when transferring data to another device
- Decrease the sound volume when solving a puzzle
- Minor improvements

What features do you want to see from Unblock Me in our next update? Please let us know!! :)
Send us your feedback and suggestions to support@kiragames.com. Thank you for your support!

This update includes a number of bug fixes and stability improvements.

- iPhone X support
- Add more puzzles in Starter Pack. So, now you can enjoy up to 2000 fun puzzles in Starter Pack.
- Fix bugs in Statistic Page, Preview on/off, and some graphics inaccuracy.

What features do you want to see from Unblock Me in our next update? Please let us know! :)
Send us your feedback and suggestions to support@kiragames.com. Thank you for your support!

This update includes:

- Fix the bug about languages

- Resolved the crashes when skipping Tutorial and when switching game modes rapidly

New Theme Alert ‘Autumn’

This release also brings visual polish and user experience optimization for a better gaming experience!

Catch us at Facebook: Kiragames
Suggestions or Comments? Give us a shout at support@kiragames.com

Thank you for playing 'Unblock Me'

This release brings minor bugs fixes, enhancements and performance improvements for a better gaming experience!

Catch us at Facebook: Kiragames
Suggestions or Comments? Give us a shout at support@kiragames.com

Thank you for playing 'Unblock Me'

What's new
* Happy Thai New Year! Let's celebrate! We wish you a Happy Songkran Festival.
* Here's our gift to you a 'Serene Siam Songkran' theme - Stay Happy, Stay Lucky!
* 2 New Hidden Themes Alert! Choccy, Sweetie! & Halloween!

Improvements
* 'Unblock Me's 5th Year Anniversary' Theme; a left-right navigation button is available for iPhone X devices.
* 'Ocean Blue' Theme; ‘Restart' button is now fine for all devices.
* 'Twitter' share button removed.

Fixes
* Freeze after disconnecting to the Internet
* Freeze after showing playable ads
* Freeze on an in-game 'Tutorial'
* Crash on 'More Games' & 'Reward Ads' for Free Hints
* Crash on an in-game 'Puzzle Switch' dialogue
* An in-game Tutorial 'NO SHOW' for first time login

This release also brings visual polish, experience optimization, enhancements and performance improvements for a better gaming experience!

Catch us at Facebook: Kiragames
Suggestions or Comments? Give us a shout at support@kiragames.com
